018package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.coprocessor.example.row.stats;
019
020import java.util.HashMap;
021import java.util.Map;
022import org.apache.yetus.audience.InterfaceAudience;
023
024import org.apache.hbase.thirdparty.com.google.gson.JsonObject;
025
026@InterfaceAudience.Private
027public class SizeBucketTracker {
028
029  private static final SizeBucket[] SIZE_BUCKET_ARRAY = SizeBucket.values();
030  private final Map<SizeBucket, Long> bucketToCount;
031
032  public SizeBucketTracker() {
033    SizeBucket[] sizeBucketsArray = SizeBucket.values();
034
035    bucketToCount = new HashMap<>(sizeBucketsArray.length);
036    for (SizeBucket sizeBucket : sizeBucketsArray) {
037      bucketToCount.put(sizeBucket, 0L);
038    }
039  }
040
041  public void add(long rowBytes) {
042    if (rowBytes < 0) {
043      return;
044    }
045    SizeBucket sizeBucket = search(rowBytes);
046    if (sizeBucket == null) {
047      return;
048    }
049    long val = bucketToCount.get(sizeBucket);
050    bucketToCount.put(sizeBucket, getSafeIncrementedValue(val));
051  }
052
053  public Map<String, Long> toMap() {
054    Map<String, Long> copy = new HashMap<>(SIZE_BUCKET_ARRAY.length);
055    for (SizeBucket sizeBucket : SIZE_BUCKET_ARRAY) {
056      long val = bucketToCount.get(sizeBucket);
057      copy.put(sizeBucket.bucket(), val);
058    }
059    return copy;
060  }
061
062  public JsonObject toJsonObject() {
063    JsonObject bucketJson = new JsonObject();
064    for (SizeBucket sizeBucket : SIZE_BUCKET_ARRAY) {
065      long val = bucketToCount.get(sizeBucket);
066      bucketJson.addProperty(sizeBucket.bucket(), val);
067    }
068    return bucketJson;
069  }
070
071  private SizeBucket search(long val) {
072    for (SizeBucket sizeBucket : SIZE_BUCKET_ARRAY) {
073      if (val < sizeBucket.maxBytes()) {
074        return sizeBucket;
075      }
076    }
077    return val == Long.MAX_VALUE ? SizeBucket.KILOBYTES_MAX : null;
078  }
079
080  private static long getSafeIncrementedValue(long val) {
081    return val == Long.MAX_VALUE ? val : val + 1;
082  }
083}
